traits.name: Portal Sense
entries: The bloodhound can sense the presence of portals within 30 feet of itself, including inactive portals, and instinctively knows the destination of each portal.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The bloodhound makes three Clawed Gauntlet attacks.

actions.name: Clawed Gauntlet
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6 damage) necrotic damage.
